_comment: VNC Server v3.0 Configuration - Enhanced with Advanced Encodings
_advanced_encodings: New high-performance encoding options (experimental - test before production use)
_parallel_encoding: Multi-threaded encoding for better CPU utilization

_performance_notes.frame_rate: 1-60 FPS (localhost: up to 120 FPS), higher = smoother but more CPU/bandwidth
_performance_notes.enable_region_detection: Reduces bandwidth for incremental updates (auto-disabled for localhost)
_performance_notes.enable_tight_encoding: 20-100x compression (experimental - may have issues with some clients)
_performance_notes.enable_h264_encoding: 50-500x compression for video streaming (experimental, requires PyAV)
_performance_notes.encoding_threads: null = auto-detect (CPU count - 1), or specify number
_performance_notes.enable_websocket: Enable browser-based access via noVNC (disabled by default, set to true to enable)

_encoding_priority: Tight > ZRLE > Hextile > RRE > CopyRect > Raw (auto-selected based on client and content)

_bandwidth_optimization.low_bandwidth: Use Tight encoding with JPEG for photos
_bandwidth_optimization.medium_bandwidth: Use Tight encoding for all content
_bandwidth_optimization.high_bandwidth_localhost: Auto-optimized: Raw encoding, no change detection, high frame rate
_bandwidth_optimization.video_streaming: Enable H.264 encoding for best quality/bandwidth ratio
